long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open in Apple Maps
Instantly view any Google Maps location in Apple Maps with a single click! This open-source Chrome extension seamlessly bridges the gap between Google Maps and Apple Maps, enhancing your navigation experience.
Key Features:

Automatic Location Detection: Instantly recognizes the location you're viewing in Google Maps.
Smart Notification: Displays a sleek, unobtrusive notification when a location is detected.
One-Click Open: Launch the current location in Apple Maps with just one click.
Precise Coordinate Transfer: Accurately transfers latitude and longitude for pinpoint accuracy.
Address Recognition: Captures full address details when available.
Customizable Settings: Adjust notification duration and enable/disable autodetect to suit your preferences.
Seamless Integration: Works smoothly with Google Maps without interfering with your browsing experience.
Open Source: Fully transparent codebase available on GitHub, welcoming community contributions and review.

Perfect for Apple device users who find themselves on Google Maps but prefer the integrated experience of Apple Maps. Whether you're planning a trip, looking up a business, or just exploring, "Open in Apple Maps" makes it effortless to switch between mapping services.
Enhance your navigation experience - add "Open in Apple Maps" to your Chrome browser today!
Open Source

This extension is open source and available on GitHub. We believe in transparency and community-driven development. Feel free to review the code, suggest improvements, or contribute to the project:
